required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Correlation Between Preoperative Precise Biometrics, Spatial Assessment and Postoperative Visual Quality in Cataract Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Study of the Correlation Between Preoperative Precise Biometrics, Spatial Assessment and Postoperative Visual Quality in Cataract Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: This study summarizes the experience of precision treatment and postoperative management of various types of cataract, and intend to further improve the quality of Clinical Cataract diagnosis and treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: Based on the existing cataract surgery methods, through prospective follow-up study, this study summarizes the experience of precision treatment and postoperative management of various types of cataract, and intends to further improve the quality of Clinical Cataract diagnosis and treatment.

primary_outcome.description: The BCVA was measured by the same optometrist at each visit
The BCVA was measured by the same optometrist at each visit
The BCVA was measured by the same optometrist at each visit
The UCVA was measured by the same optometrist at each visit
The UCVA was measured by the same optometrist at each visit
The UCVA was measured by the same optometrist at each visit
Intraocular pressure measured using non-contact tonometer
Intraocular pressure measured using non-contact tonometer
Intraocular pressure measured using non-contact tonometer
Tear Breakup Time was performed to assess tear film stability
Tear Breakup Time was performed to assess tear film stability
Tear Breakup Time was performed to assess tear film stability
Endothelial cell density was measured by specular microscopy
The contrast sensitivity was recorded in dark environment, glare dark environment, light environment, glare light environment
From +2.00d to -4.00d, 13 different diopter states were obtained by decreasing the spherical lens degree of +0.50d, and the defocus curve was formed
The binocular diopter was not corrected. The stereopsis test card was used to record the arc seconds of random points, animals and circles
The frequency of long / medium / short distance use of corrective glasses was scored as 0%, 25%, 50%, 75% and 100%
Glare, halos, starburst and other visual quality problems were graded as mild（1 score), moderate（2 score) and severe（3 score)
The visual acuity satisfaction of distance / middle / near distance was scored from 0 (totally dissatisfied) to 10 (totally satisfied)

study_pop.textblock: Cataract surgery was performed in ophthalmic hospital affiliated to Medical College of Zhejiang University

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with monocular or binocular cataract, lens opacity or abnormal position, need surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- The history of systemic diseases and medication affecting vision, diabetic patients with systemic conditions complicated with retinopathy, uncontrolled blood glucose, severe eye diseases, eye trauma, eye surgery, severe dry eye and ocular surface diseases, strabismus and amblyopia were identified

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University School of Medicine
